You will not be able to collect payments online if you remove account.
If you delete the account, you will not be able to collect payments online. In that case, you have to redo KYC.
Things you need to complete KYC
Have a lot of pending dues & want to collect faster?
Send a Reminder on WhatsApp with QR and Online Payment link
